programme.title: The Christmas Quest
programme.desc: An archeologist and her ex-husband, an expert in ancient Norse languages, are sent to Iceland at Christmastime to search for the legendary treasure of the Yule Lads.

programme.title: Villa Amore
programme.desc: Liara goes to Italy and impulsively buys the villa where her parents met. She soon learns she is in way over her head and must ask a lawyer-turned-handyman to help her renovate.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche must have a pacemaker implanted and worries that it will affect her sex life.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A young man claims to be the illegitimate son of Blanche's late husband.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose must test for AIDS following the revelation that she may have received a tainted transfusion.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose's childhood love reappears and vies with Miles for her attention.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier and Niles have a courtroom face-off over the question of a wealthy eccentric's sanity.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier becomes attracted to a traffic officer (Jane Kaczmarek) after she pulls him and Roz over for speeding.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne signs her and Van up for Lamaze class; Reba gets into an argument with Brock when she encounters him and Barbra Jean in a childbirth class.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba ends up doing most of the work for Van's job when she insists they pay for a car given to him by Brock.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Brock spends a night in Jake's treehouse, Reba finds herself babysitting her ex-husband's newborn.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne goes into labor shortly before her high-school graduation ceremony; Reba sings a lullaby to her new granddaughter in the hospital.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba's children carouse at Brock and Barbra Jean's place; Cheyenne and Van commiserate with each other about the baby.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Just when Reba thinks things are getting back to normal, the Montgomery family is forced to move back in.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: Christmas by Design
programme.desc: A fashion designer learns what's most important in life when she joins a Christmas challenge to create a new holiday-themed collection.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A photographer returns home to take care of her grandmother and gets involved with helping a neighbor look after his young nephew.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: A Machu Picchu Proposal
programme.desc: Katie helps plan her brother's proposal atop Machu Picchu. When the proposal is ruined by spontaneous Chef Carlos, Katie enlists Carlos to help her find the most romantic spot in all of Peru.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Chiefs Love Story
programme.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone in the Chiefs front office along the way.

programme.title: Christmas on Call
programme.desc: The lives of First Responders in Philadelphia intersect over the holiday season while juggling work, personal lives and their dedication to protect and serve their city.

programme.title: Holiday Mismatch
programme.desc: New retiree Barb joins a Holiday Committee but clashes with long standing member Kath. When they realize their kids have started dating, they conspire to break up the happy couple.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's love life is the basis for her sister's romantic novel.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy sees an old flame; Blanche and Sophia fall prey to con artists.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche supplies a date for wedding-bound Dorothy; Sophia puts a curse on the newlyweds.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: In order to get a syndication deal, Frasier has to help his agent, Bebe, quit smoking.

programme.title: The Town Christmas Forgot
programme.desc: A stranded family (Lauren Holly, Rick Roberts) helps residents of a small town organize a Christmas pageant.

programme.title: Once Upon a Holiday
programme.desc: When a royal princess runs away from her official obligations and duties, she starts to fall in love with a good Samaritan who is unaware of her real identity.

programme.title: Holiday Hotline
programme.desc: After leaving London, Abby works for a cooking hotline and connects with an anonymous caller, a single father who Abby is unknowingly smitten with in real life.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Tina's Miracle
programme.desc: Successful gift-wrapping shop owner Tina is in charge of planning this year's annual Christmas gala. But things begin to go awry when the gala faces cancellation due to a scrooge-like estate owner.
